tool_description: Ordering Stack Menu API.  Manage menu for restaurants, menu nodes, menu items, priceslists, combo meals, etc.
name: Menu
title: Menu

api_list.name: getList
api_list.description: Get paginated list of MenuItems. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://menu7.p.rapidapi.com/menu-api/api/items"
querystring = {"filter": "{
  "_sort": [],
  "_order": [
    "ASC"
  ],
  "_start": 0,
  "_end": 0,
  "id": "",
  "kind": [
    "3e/group/category"
  ],
  "pricelist": "",
  "category": "",
  "name": "",
  "nameEn": "",
  "query": ""
}"}

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "menu7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=querystring)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getLock
menu
api_list.description: Get menu definition. Returns whole menu with evaluated references and queries. Also returns currently defined locks for instance.

api_list.name: menuItem
api_list.description: Get single product definition. Returns product definition by its ID. All references are evaluated.

api_list.name: getMenu
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://menu7.p.rapidapi.com/menu-api/api/menu-definitions/MENU_default"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "menu7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getItem
api_list.description: Retrieve menu item by ID from database.

api_list.name: getDefinitions
api_list.description: Get paginated list of Menu definitions (menu sets assigned to venues). This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.

api_list.name: getLocks
api_list.description: Get paginated list of Locks. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.

api_list.name: locks
api_list.description: Get currently set locks for instance (i.e. venue). Returns all locks with matching instance and global locks (without any instance assigned)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://menu7.p.rapidapi.com/menu-api/api/locks/venue-1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "menu7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for products by partial string (suggest). Returns all products which id, name or description literals contains provided string. It tries to determine locale by Accept-Locale request header and checks also name-[LOCALE] and description-[LOCALE] literals.
